item.title: Csa Tools of the Trade
item.description: So a question I often get asked is “what tools or products do you use?”. So I decided to do a post around the tools and technologies that I personally use on a daily basis. So to start this is what people see on my screen on a daily basis. This is my most common tool, Visual Studio Code, the version shown above is actually theÂ Insiders Build. The primary reason for this tool is that is a “container” for other tools and functionality.
